aka: There is no memories left   I record everything
duration: 21分钟(2010完整单色版)19分钟19秒(2012导演剪辑彩色版)
this_title: 这里没有剩下的回忆了，我都录下来了
trans_title: There is no memories left   I record everything
introduction: 只有两个男人的城市，一个男人和另一个男人在一起。一个男人去旅行，另一个男人留下并在记忆中发现了离去的男人离去的男人从记忆中跳出穿着裙子，这个从记忆中出来的男人和他做爱然后自杀。留下的男人感到寂寞，终于要去旅行；但这时候旅行的男人正在回来两人错过。Introduction to the filmwhole the city just only two man, they are live together.One day, a man go to travel, another man stay behind and he in the memory discover leave of the manremoved man wears dresses jumped out his the memory brain , memory of the man with his make love and committed suicide.Loneliness is slowly swallowed with this man ,finally, he determine going to travel，and same time the travelin' man come back on the way.......Cross miss two guy
chinese_title: 这里没有剩下的回忆了，我都录下来了
